General.Name: SPCG Public Company Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: SPCG Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity from solar energy in Thailand and internationally. The company has 36 solar farm projects with a total installed capacity of 260 megawatts. It is also involved in the engineering, procurement, and construction, as well as operation, maintenance, and monitoring of solar farms. In addition, the company manufactures, trades in, and installs solar roof for residences, commercial buildings, office buildings, government building, and industrial plants; and steel or metal roofing sheets. SPCG Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 1 Capital Work Place Building, Bangkok, Thailand, 10110
